sn12.3:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the wrong practice and the right practice.
sn12.3:4.3: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
sn12.3:5.2: Ignorance is a condition for choices.
sn12.3:5.3: Choices are a condition for consciousness. …
sn12.3:5.4: That is how this entire mass of suffering originates.
sn12.3:5.5: This is called the wrong practice.
sn12.3:6.2: When ignorance fades away and ceases with nothing left over, choices cease.
sn12.3:6.4: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn12.3:6.5: This is called the right practice.”
